name: Kappa-kun to Asobou: Kappa-kun to 3 Biki no Koneko
overview: (Google Translated from Japanese WiiWare page) The third series of Yomikakase picture book "Kappa and Asobo" series appeared in the Wii !! "Kappa-kun and Asobo Kampan and Three Babies Konko", so that parents get busy parenting parents to get bored with their children It is a moving picture book to read. There is also an "AIUEO puzzle" to remember Hiragana. It is compatible with Nintendo Wi - Fi connection paid service, and as a supplementary content, Yomiko Ryoko 's Yomikakase narration is also available. Please use by all means when playing with children.
